home.heroSubtitle: Order your food products from the best suppliers easily and quickly
home.heroBadge: Complete Procurement Management Platform for Restaurants
home.heroDescription: A complete platform for restaurant procurement management. Order from multiple suppliers, track your spending, and use order templates to save time.
home.orderTemplatesDesc: Save recurring orders and reorder with one click
home.featuresTitle: Everything You Need to Manage Your
home.featuresSubtitleNew: Professional tools designed to streamline purchasing operations and save time and money
home.featuresSubtitle: We offer you an easy and reliable shopping experience with exclusive features
home.unifiedCartDesc: Order from multiple suppliers in one cart and complete payment once
home.orderTemplatesFeatureDesc: Save your recurring orders as templates and reorder with one click to save time
home.spendAnalyticsFeatureDesc: Detailed analytics of your monthly purchases distributed by supplier and product
home.branchManagementDesc: Manage orders for all your branches from one place easily
home.instantNotificationsDesc: Real-time alerts for your order status and supplier updates
home.favoriteSuppliersDesc: Save your favorite suppliers for quick access to their products
home.flexibleDeliveryDesc: Choose delivery to branch or pickup from warehouse
home.fastDeliveryDesc: Wide delivery network ensuring your orders arrive on time
home.guaranteedQualityDesc: Certified suppliers and high-quality products with return guarantee
home.orderTrackingDesc: Track your order status moment by moment from order to delivery
home.securePaymentDesc: Multiple secure payment methods with clear electronic invoices
home.continuousSupportDesc: Dedicated support team available around the clock to assist you
home.benefitsSubtitle: Real results achieved by our restaurant customers
home.benefitSavingsDesc: Save up to 30% on procurement costs by comparing prices
home.benefitTimeDesc: 5x faster than traditional ordering with order templates
home.benefitControlDesc: Complete control over your budget with detailed spending reports
home.fourSimpleSteps: Four simple steps to get your products
home.createAccountDesc: Register as a restaurant in minutes for free
home.browseProductsStepDesc: Explore thousands of products from trusted suppliers
home.addToCartDesc: Choose products from multiple suppliers in one cart
home.receiveOrderDesc: Track your order and receive it on time
home.startJourney: Ready to Improve Your Procurement Management?
home.ctaDescription: Join hundreds of restaurants using BFOOD to save time and money managing their procurement

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: At BFOOD, we are committed to protecting the privacy of our users. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect personal information you provide when using our platform.

dataCollectionItems.account: Account information: Name, email, phone number
dataCollectionItems.business: Business information: Restaurant or company name, address
dataCollectionItems.orders: Order information: Order and transaction details
dataCollectionItems.location: Location information: Geographic region to facilitate delivery

dataUsageItems.orders: Facilitating ordering and delivery between restaurants and suppliers
dataUsageItems.communication: Communicating with you about your orders and account
dataUsageItems.improvement: Improving our services and user experience
dataUsageItems.security: Ensuring the security and safety of the platform

privacy.dataSharingText: We share necessary contact information between restaurants and suppliers to complete orders. We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.
privacy.dataProtectionText: We use advanced security technologies to protect your data, including encryption and industry-standard security measures.

yourRightsItems.deletion: Request deletion of your account and data
yourRightsItems.objection: Object to processing of your data

privacy.contactUsText: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us via email or through the contact form on our website.
privacy.policyUpdateText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes via email or platform notification.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptanceText: By using the BFOOD platform, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to any of these terms, please do not use the platform.
terms.serviceDescriptionText: BFOOD is a platform that connects restaurants with food product suppliers. We provide tools to facilitate ordering, delivery, and communication between parties.

registrationItems.accurate: You must provide accurate and complete information when registering
registrationItems.confidential: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information
registrationItems.unauthorized: You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account
registrationItems.age: You must be 18 years or older to register

restaurantObligationsItems.payment: Commit to paying suppliers on time

supplierObligationsItems.quality: Provide high-quality products that match descriptions
supplierObligationsItems.updates: Update product information and prices regularly
supplierObligationsItems.compliance: Comply with all health and food regulations

terms.ordersPaymentText: Payment between restaurants and suppliers is made directly upon delivery. The platform is not responsible for any financial disputes between parties.

disclaimerItems.mediator: The platform is only a mediator and is not responsible for product quality
disclaimerItems.availability: We do not guarantee availability of all products at all times
disclaimerItems.suspension: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate any account that violates the terms

terms.intellectualPropertyText: All platform content including logos, designs, and text are owned by BFOOD. They may not be copied or used without prior written permission.
terms.termsUpdateText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. You will be notified of any material changes. Your continued use of the platform means you accept the updated terms.
